author: Dan Lepard
serves: Makes enough for a 18cm/7in round cake
method: Measure the icing sugar into a bowl, then melt the butter for a few seconds in the microwave or in a small pan over a low heat, taking care not to burn it.  Pour the melted buter with the cream and brandy into the sugar and mix until smooth. Use to cover a cake while warm, then leave to set before cutting the cake.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz icing sugar,  50g/1¾oz butter,  25ml/1fl oz double cream,  25ml/1fl oz brandy
